title: Feature Request: Vertical Connections Tabs List
author: ThiagoMMontenegro
body_snippet:
With connections names being horizontal (as any other written word) would be good to have all connections listed horizontally in the left (or even right) side of the screen rather the horizontally on the top of the screen.
